checker.name: ExplainQueryPlanChecker
checker.element: sqlite_master

select count(rconversation.username) from rconversation,rcontact where unreadcount > ? and rconversation.username = rcontact.username and (? != ? or rconversation.username like ? or rconversation.username not like ?) and type? = ? and attrflag? = ? and (parentref or parentref = ? and rcontact.username != ?)
select count(*) from rcontact where type & ? != ? and username = ?
select username from rcontact where verifyflag & ? != ? and type & ? != ?

select bizinfo.brandiconurl,bizinfo.type,bizinfo.status,rcontact.username,rcontact.conremark,rcontact.nickname,rcontact.alias,rcontact.conremarkpyfull,rcontact.conremarkpyshort,rcontact.showhead,rcontact.pyinitial,rcontact.quanpin from rcontact,bizinfo where rcontact.username = bizinfo.username and rcontact.verifyflag & ? != ? and rcontact.type & ? != ? order by showhead,upper(quanpin)length(conremarkpyfull) > ?,upper(conremarkpyfull),upper(quanpin)length(conremark) > ?,upper(conremark),upper(quanpin),upper(nickname)

select count(username) from rcontact where type & ? != ? and type & ? = ? and type & ? = ? and verifyflag & ? = ? and username like ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ?

select count(username) from rcontact where type & ? != ? and type & ? = ? and type & ? = ? and verifyflag & ? = ? and username not like ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? and rcontact.username != ? or username = ?

select *,rowid from rcontact where type & ? != ? and username like ? and type & ? = ? order by showhead,upper(quanpin)length(conremarkpyfull) > ?,upper(conremarkpyfull),upper(quanpin)length(conremark) > ?,upper(conremark),upper(quanpin),upper(nickname),upper(username)

select username,nickname,alias,conremark,verifyflag,showhead,weiboflag,rowid,deleteflag,lvbuff from rcontact where type & ? != ? and type & ? = ? and type & ? = ? and verifyflag & ? = ? and (username not like ? or (type & ? != ? and type & ? = ? and username like ?)) and username != ? and username != ? and username != ? and username != ? or username = ? order by showhead,upper(quanpin)length(conremarkpyfull) > ?,upper(conremarkpyfull),upper(quanpin)length(conremark) > ?,upper(conremark),upper(quanpin),upper(nickname),upper(username)

select bizinfo.username from rcontact,bizinfo where rcontact.username = bizinfo.username and rcontact.verifyflag & ? != ? and rcontact.type & ? != ? and bizinfo.type = ? order by rcontact.showhead,upper(rcontact.quanpin)length(rcontact.conremarkpyfull) > ?,upper(rcontact.conremarkpyfull),upper(rcontact.quanpin)length(rcontact.conremark) > ?,upper(rcontact.conremark),upper(rcontact.quanpin),upper(rcontact.nickname),upper(rcontact.username)
select username,unreadcount from rconversation where username like ? and (? != ? or rconversation.username like ? or rconversation.username not like ?) and unreadcount > ?
select count(rowid) from rcontact where type & ? != ? and verifyflag & ? != ?
select *,rowid from rcontact where type & ? != ? and verifyflag & ? != ?

select sum(unreadcount) from rconversation,rcontact where rconversation.unreadcount > ? and (rconversation.parentref or parentref = ?) and rconversation.username = rcontact.username and (? != ? or rconversation.username like ? or rconversation.username not like ?) and type? = ? and rcontact.username != ?
select username from bizinfo where accepttype & ? > ?
select * from openmsglistener where status = ?
select msgsvrid,createtime from bottlemessage where createtime > ? and talker like ?
select *,rowid from rcontact where username = ? or encryptusername = ?
